xml.log: If there is an update when the file file is missing, go to Steam Client - Library List - mydockfinder - right-click menu - Properties - Local File - Verify software file integrity If the desktop icon is not displayed after enabling pre-stage scheduling, you can right-click on the desktop-view-display desktop icon to enable display desktop icon Changelog 1.Fixed the issue that the previous version of MyFinder shortcut keys could not adjust the brightness and the brightness prompt was not displayed 2.Fixed the issue that the dock window preview occasionally did not disappear 3.Fixed the issue that the volume menu did not display the audio device when MyFinder was multi-screen 4.Fixed the MyFinder startup crash in multi-screen situations 5.Fixed the issue that myfinder did not display the input method icon when there was only one input method in the previous version 6.Fixed the issue that some systems could not switch input methods from MyFinder 7.Fix other issues 8.Added Czech translations, thanks to all translations provided by netizen @Jan Pe≈ôina 9.Optimized launchpad search, now you can enter search directly after displaying launchpad 10.Optimized launchpad motion blur background, all rendered in the GPU 11.MyFinder adds multi-screen custom zoom function, which can be turned on in Preferences - MyFinder General, and only multiple monitors can use this function 12.Pre-stage scheduling adds the function of opening the window boundary, which can be turned on in Preferences - Pre-stage Scheduling, the size of the window boundary is an estimated measurement, and there will be inaccurate boundaries 13.The window minimization animation adds the dynamic window refresh function, which can be turned on in Preferences - Minimization
